properties:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_PWD = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO MEMBER( USER_ID, USER_PWD, NICKNAME, STATUS, SKIN_ID, COIN, SELF_INFO, GENDER, ENROLL_DATE) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? )
-
SELECT USER_ID, NICKNAME, SKIN_ID, SELF_INFO, GENDER FROM MEMBER JOIN CHARACTER_SKIN USING(SKIN_ID) WHERE USER_ID = ?
